description:
The flying fish riders attack on the Straw Hats take place in the air and sea. Luffy is memorized by the flying fish as Zoro attempts to free Hatchan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Higeki! Kamen ni Kakusareta Duval no Shinjitsu
Tragedy! The Truth Hidden Behind Duval`s Mask!
Tragédie ! La vérité cachée derrière le masque de Duval
Трагедия! Вся правда Дюваля в железной маске!
مأساة! الحقيقة المخفيّة خلف قناع دوفال!
悲劇! 仮面に隠されたデュバルの真実
